resources.string: %s%% of Payment is given as Cashback to Customer.\nIf 0%%, means No Cashback is given.
%s feature to \'Add Money\' to Customer Account.
%s feature to do \'Overdraft\' from Customer Account.
%s%% of \'Money Added\' to Customer Account is given as \'Extra Cashback\'.\nIf 0%%, means No Extra Cashback is given.
Extra Cashback applies, only if \'Money Added\' to Account is more than %s.
"Change \'%s\' as Business Contact Phone number.\nDo not add 0 in start."

string-array.name: newOrderCancelReasons
string-array.item: Customer made the order by mistake
Customer address out of delivery area
Delivery time not as per Customer
